description: The Immigration and Refugee Board requires a senior consultant to review the IRB’s interpreter services program. The review will provide recommendations on how to manage and operate an effective, secure program that meets the requirements of the IRB and refugee claimants. The consultant will also review the contracting and delivery model of the services, including consideration for outsourcing as an option.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Review of the Immigration and Refugee Board Interpretation Program

### Details
* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01026856
* **Date of Publication**: February 21, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 7, 2023 (13:00:00 EST)
* **Contracting Entity**: Immigration and Refugee Board
* **Contracting Authority**: Christos Papoutsis
* **End User**: Immigration and Refugee Board

### Background
The Immigration and Refugee Board (IRB) invites proposals from eligible suppliers to review and provide recommendations on the interpretation program. The successful contractor will be responsible for reviewing the program’s effectiveness, security, and delivery model, including potential outsourcing options.

### Scope of Work
* Review the current interpretation program
* Provide recommendations for program enhancements
* Review the contracting and delivery model
* Consider potential outsourcing options

### Security Requirements
The successful contractor must meet the Common PS SRCL #6 security requirement. The company must be designated as a Secure Authority (SA) under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) arrangement and the resource must have a Reliability Security level.

### Trade Agreements
This contract is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

### Estimated Contract Duration
The estimated contract duration is from contract award to August 31, 2023. The estimated level of effort is 80 days.

### Instructions to Suppliers
Eligible suppliers are invited to submit their proposals. The proposal submission deadline is March 7, 2023. For further information, please contact Christos Papoutsis at christos.papoutsis@irb-cisr.gc.ca. All inquiries and bids should be directed to IRB.Procurement-Acquisitions.CISR@irb-cisr.gc.ca.
